summary: Senior Systems Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable backend systems and enterprise applications across finance, e-commerce, and public sectors. Achieved results including 40% fewer system failures, payroll processing accelerated by one week, and reporting cut from 30 minutes to under 5. Skilled in .NET, SQL optimization, and automation, with a focus on modernizing legacy platforms and mentoring teams.

highlights: Architected a biometric attendance tracking solution using ZK Teco devices, accelerating payroll cycles by 7 days.
Consolidated dual legacy core banking plugins into a unified .NET application, reducing system crashes by 40% and cutting maintenance hours by 20+ hours/month.
Developed a real-time notification platform via Telegram Bot API, shortening response times and elevating system reliability to 99%.
Optimized reporting pipelines with SQL indexing and caching, reducing query load times from minutes to under 2 seconds.
Implemented secure authentication and CORS in web reporting, eliminating 100% of unauthorized access attempts and ensuring compliance with internal IT audits.
Mentored two junior developers and authored technical documentation to guarantee seamless maintenance and long-term application continuity.
Engineered Python REST APIs and a custom Odoo ERP interface, streamlining workflows and achieving 99% user satisfaction.
Integrated Microsoft Teams into Odoo, streamlining in-app scheduling that boosted cross-team meeting adoption by 35% and cut manual coordination by 10+ hours weekly.
Upgraded Odoo to version 14, enhancing system performance, eCommerce, inventory management, and automation workflows.
Connected Odoo with ABA PayWay gateway, improving transaction reliability by 30% and enabling smoother processing for 1,000+ monthly payments.
Launched Khmer Care, a real-time fundraising platform that raised $70.8K and secured partnerships with 30+ organizations.
Enhanced the Firearms Metrics Platform, reducing reporting time from 30 minutes to under 5 minutes and accelerating data analysis for 200+ law enforcement personnel.
Designed and built a POS system with automated inventory and scale device integration, eliminating manual 99% entry errors.
Delivered a full-scale Hotel Management System with a real-time booking engine, reducing guest check-in time by 50% and increasing booking efficiency by 30%.
Constructed a Clinic Management System with scheduling, notifications, and patient tracking, cutting wait times by 45% and improving staff utilization by 20%.
Orchestrated Odoo ERP setup and customization for an e-commerce solution, enabling real-time order tracking and driving a 15% boost in customer retention.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
